name: SkeeBrawl
description:
Unfortunately this game is only playable with Xbox controllers and 2 or 4 players. Sorry about that!


Skeebrawl is a sports game developed to replicate a physical sport game of the same name. Players can be 'tagged' and eliminated by opposing players when on their side, and balls must be retrieved from the translucent zones and thrown into the opposing player's goals for different points.

Made in three days for a sports-themed game jam!

Art by Josh Garcia

Programming and Design by Rubi Carpio and Devon Wiersma
